unnormalised: Hey folks, regarding pesticide usage, what's the scene like in your area? In my village near Kochi, Kerala, during Onam season, everyone frets about pesticide residue on the produce used for the Onam Sadhya. Heard some farmers in Punjab are facing serious issues too. Should we look at alternatives like neem oil more seriously? Maybe agricultural universities like IARI can help find solutions? We need safe food, yaar!
normalised: Hey folks, regarding pesticide usage, what is the scene like in your area? In my village near Kochi, Kerala, during Onam season, everyone frets about pesticide residue on the produce used for the Onam Sadhya. Heard some farmers in Punjab are facing serious issues too. Should we look at alternatives like neem oil more seriously? Maybe agricultural universities like I A R I can help find solutions? We need safe food, yaar!
